thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aroundtown Places EUR 800 Million Fixed Rate Notes Due 2028

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aroundtown Places EUR 800 Million Fixed Rate Notes Due 2028
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - AROUNDTOWN SA:
* SUCCESSFULLY PLACES EUR 800 MILLION FIXED RATE NOTES DUE 2028 UNDER EMTN PROGRAMME
* PLACEMENT OF EUR 800,000,000 OF 1.625% FIXED RATE NOTES DUE 2028 UNDER EURO MEDIUM TERM NOTE PROGRAMME
* ISSUE PRICE OF 97.179% OF PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF NOTES * INTENDS TO USE AMOUNT RAISED BY NOTES TO RE-FINANCE AND/OR REPAY EXISTING DEBT AND FUND COâ€˜S GROWTH STRATEGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
